statements: UPDATE DrugInteraction SET interaction='Common', severity='Moderate' WHERE drug_name='DrugA';
UPDATE DrugInteraction SET severity='Severe', interaction='Rare' WHERE drug_name='DrugB';
UPDATE DrugInteraction SET severity = 'High' WHERE drug_name = 'Aspirin';
UPDATE DrugInteraction SET severity = 'Low', interaction = 'No interaction' WHERE drug_name = 'Ibuprofen';
UPDATE Drug_Interactions SET interaction_description = 'Moderate interactions' WHERE drug_id = 1;
UPDATE Medication_Management SET dosage = 2.5, frequency = 'Twice daily' WHERE patient_id = 101;
UPDATE Drug_Interactions SET interaction_description = 'Moderate side effects' WHERE drug_id = 101;
UPDATE Medication_Management SET dosage = 2.5, frequency = 'Twice daily' WHERE patient_id = 201 AND drug_id = 105;
UPDATE Drug_Interactions SET interaction_description='Severe interaction' WHERE drug_id=1;
UPDATE Patients SET patient_age=35, patient_conditions='Hypertension, Diabetes' WHERE patient_id=3;
UPDATE Drug_Interactions SET interaction_description = 'Interaction updated for Drug A' WHERE drug_id = 1;
UPDATE Patients SET patient_age = 40, patient_conditions = 'Hypertension, Diabetes' WHERE patient_id = 3;
UPDATE medication_list SET dosage='10mg' WHERE medication_id=1;
UPDATE patient_data SET gender='Female' WHERE patient_id=3;
UPDATE drug_interactions SET interaction_description = 'New interaction description' WHERE drug_id = 1;
UPDATE patient_data SET age = 30, gender = 'Female' WHERE patient_id = 2;
UPDATE patients SET age = 30 WHERE patient_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE medications SET frequency = 'daily', dosage = '100mg' WHERE med_name = 'Aspirin';
